label = {tab:duty} 
] 
{%width=23cm, 
	rowhead=1, 
	colspec={*{11}{X X X X X X X X X X X}}, 
	row{odd} = {white}, row{even} = {blue9},

	column{11} = {2.5cm}, 
}
